mapper.insert: insert into board (user_no, board_title, create_date, board_content, status) values (#{userNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{createDate}, #{boardContent}, #{status})
mapper.update: update board set board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent} where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where board_no = #{boardNo} and user_no = #{userNo}
